atomic_tests.name: Create Volume Shadow Copy with vssadmin
atomic_tests.description:
This test is intended to be run on a domain Controller.

The Active Directory database NTDS.dit may be dumped by copying it from a Volume Shadow Copy.

drive_letter.description: Drive letter to source VSC (including colon)

dependencies.description: Target must be a Domain Controller
dependencies.get_prereq_command: echo Sorry, Promoting this machine to a Domain Controller must be done manually

atomic_tests.name: Copy NTDS.dit from Volume Shadow Copy
atomic_tests.description:
This test is intended to be run on a domain Controller.

The Active Directory database NTDS.dit may be dumped by copying it from a Volume Shadow Copy.

This test requires steps taken in the test "Create Volume Shadow Copy with vssadmin".
A successful test also requires the export of the SYSTEM Registry hive.
This test must be executed on a Windows Domain Controller.

executor.name: command_prompt
executor.cleanup_command:
del "#{extract_path}\ntds.dit"        >nul 2> nul
del "#{extract_path}\VSC_SYSTEM_HIVE" >nul 2> nul
del "#{extract_path}\SYSTEM_HIVE"     >nul 2> nul

dependencies.description: Target must be a Domain Controller
dependencies.get_prereq_command: echo Sorry, Promoting this machine to a Domain Controller must be done manually
echo Run "Invoke-AtomicTest T1003.003 -TestName 'Create Volume Shadow Copy with vssadmin'" to fulfill this requirement

atomic_tests.name: Dump Active Directory Database with NTDSUtil
atomic_tests.description:
This test is intended to be run on a domain Controller.

The Active Directory database NTDS.dit may be dumped using NTDSUtil for offline credential theft attacks. This capability
uses the "IFM" or "Install From Media" backup functionality that allows Active Directory restoration or installation of
subsequent domain controllers without the need of network-based replication.

Upon successful completion, you will find a copy of the ntds.dit file in the C:\Windows\Temp directory.

executor.name: command_prompt
executor.command:
mkdir #{output_folder}
ntdsutil "ac i ntds" "ifm" "create full #{output_folder}" q q

output_folder.description: Path where resulting dump should be placed

dependencies.description: Target must be a Domain Controller
dependencies.get_prereq_command: echo Sorry, Promoting this machine to a Domain Controller must be done manually

atomic_tests.name: Create Volume Shadow Copy remotely with WMI
atomic_tests.description:
This test is intended to be run from a remote workstation with domain admin context.
The Active Directory database NTDS.dit may be dumped by copying it from a Volume Shadow Copy.

drive_letter.description: Drive letter to source VSC (including colon and backslash)

target_host.description: IP Address / Hostname you want to target

dependencies.description: Target must be a reachable Domain Controller, and current context must be domain admin
dependencies.get_prereq_command: echo Sorry, can't connect to target host, check: network, firewall or permissions (must be admin on target)
